description: Flowbite button components with various styles and sizes

primary.name: Primary Button
primary.description: Main action button with primary color
primary.html: <button class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5">{{text}}</button>

secondary.name: Secondary Button
secondary.description: Secondary action button with outline style
secondary.html: <button class="py-2.5 px-5 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 focus:outline-none bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-100">{{text}}</button>

success.name: Success Button
success.description: Success action button with green color
success.html: <button class="text-white bg-green-700 hover:bg-green-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-green-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5">{{text}}</button>

danger.name: Danger Button
danger.description: Dangerous action button with red color
danger.html: <button class="text-white bg-red-700 hover:bg-red-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-red-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5">{{text}}</button>

components.name: Primary Button
components.description: Hlavné akčné tlačidlo s primary farbou
components.html_template: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none dark:focus:ring-blue-800">{{text}}</button>

variations.name: Small Primary Button
variations.html_template: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-3 py-2 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none dark:focus:ring-blue-800">{{text}}</button>

variations.name: Large Primary Button
variations.html_template: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-base px-5 py-3 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none dark:focus:ring-blue-800">{{text}}</button>

examples.name: Základné použitie
examples.code: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none dark:focus:ring-blue-800">Default</button>

examples.name: S ikonou
examples.code: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none dark:focus:ring-blue-800"><svg class="w-5 h-5 mr-2 -ml-1" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20"><path d="M3 4a1 1 0 011-1h12a1 1 0 011 1v2a1 1 0 01-1 1H4a1 1 0 01-1-1V4zM3 10a1 1 0 011-1h6a1 1 0 011 1v6a1 1 0 01-1 1H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-6zM14 9a1 1 0 00-1 1v6a1 1 0 001 1h2a1 1 0 001-1v-6a1 1 0 00-1-1h-2z"></path></svg>Stiahnuť</button>

components.name: Secondary Button
components.html_template: <button type="button" class="py-2.5 px-5 mr-2 mb-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 focus:outline-none bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-blue-700 focus:z-10 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-gray-200 dark:focus:ring-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-400 dark:border-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:bg-gray-700">{{text}}</button>

examples.name: Základné použitie
examples.code: <button type="button" class="py-2.5 px-5 mr-2 mb-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 focus:outline-none bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-blue-700 focus:z-10 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-gray-200 dark:focus:ring-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-400 dark:border-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:bg-gray-700">Alternative</button>

components.name: Success Button
components.description: Úspešné akčné tlačidlo so zelenou farbou
components.html_template: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-green-700 hover:bg-green-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-green-300 font-medium rounded-full text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-green-600 dark:hover:bg-green-700 dark:focus:ring-green-800">{{text}}</button>

examples.name: Základné použitie
examples.code: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-green-700 hover:bg-green-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-green-300 font-medium rounded-full text-sm px-5 py-2.5 text-center mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-green-600 dark:hover:bg-green-700 dark:focus:ring-green-800">Green</button>

components.name: Danger Button
components.description: Nebezpečné akčné tlačidlo s červenou farbou
components.html_template: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-red-700 hover:bg-red-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-red-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-red-600 dark:hover:bg-red-700 dark:focus:ring-red-900">{{text}}</button>

examples.name: Základné použitie
examples.code: <button type="button" class="text-white bg-red-700 hover:bg-red-800 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-red-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-5 py-2.5 mr-2 mb-2 dark:bg-red-600 dark:hover:bg-red-700 dark:focus:ring-red-900">Red</button>
